Symbol.Script_3D:
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = DLEV3D_OFF THEN END IF gs_shadow=0 THEN SHADOW OFF RESOL gs_resol
PEN gs_cont_pen MATERIAL mat_ladder
! --- HOTSPOTS ---
UnID=1 HOTSPOT a/2-4",0,0,UnID :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT -a/2+4",0,0,UnID :UnID=UnID+1 UnID=UnID+1 ! because a/2-4",0,zzyzx hotspot became editable, with the same fix ID (3) UnID=UnID+1 ! because -a/2+4",0,zzyzx hotspot became editable, with the same fix ID (4)
! --- EDITABLE HOTSPOTS ---
HOTSPOT -a/2+4",-7",zzyzx,UnID,sr_oh,1+128 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT -a/2+4",-7",zzyzx-0.1,UnID,sr_oh,3 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT -a/2+4",-7",zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,sr_oh,2 :UnID=UnID+1
HOTSPOT a/2-4",-7",zzyzx,UnID,sr_oh,1+128 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT a/2-4",-7",zzyzx-0.1,UnID,sr_oh,3 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT a/2-4",-7",zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,sr_oh,2 :UnID=UnID+1
HOTSPOT 0,0,zzyzx,UnID,lnd_w,1+128 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT 0,-0.1,zzyzx,UnID,lnd_w,3 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT 0,lnd_w,zzyzx,UnID,lnd_w,2 :UnID=UnID+1
HOTSPOT -a/2+4"-sr_w/2,-7"+sr_d/2,zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,tr_oh,1+128 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT -a/2+4"-sr_w/2,-7"+sr_d/2-0.1,zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,tr_oh,3 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT -a/2+4"-sr_w/2,-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,tr_oh,2 :UnID=UnID+1
HOTSPOT a/2-4"+sr_w/2,-7"+sr_d/2,zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,tr_oh,1+128 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT a/2-4"+sr_w/2,-7"+sr_d/2-0.1,zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,tr_oh,3 :UnID=UnID+1 HOTSPOT a/2-4"+sr_w/2,-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,zzyzx+sr_oh,UnID,tr_oh,2 :UnID=UnID+1
!using fix unID, because there were fix hotspots before and their unID was 3 and 4
hotspot a/2-4",0,0, unID, zzyzx, 1+128 :UnID=UnID+1 hotspot a/2-4",0,zzyzx, 3, zzyzx, 2 ! Fix ID (3) hotspot a/2-4",0,-0.1, unID, zzyzx, 3 :UnID=UnID+1
hotspot -a/2+4",0,0, unID, zzyzx, 1+128 :UnID=UnID+1 hotspot -a/2+4",0,zzyzx, 4, zzyzx, 2 ! Fix ID (4) hotspot -a/2+4",0,-0.1, unID, zzyzx, 3 :UnID=UnID+1
! --- SIDE RAIL ---
ADDz 4" PRISM_ 4,zzyzx-4"+sr_oh, a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2,15, a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2,15, a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"-sr_d/2,15, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,15
PRISM_ 4,zzyzx-4"+sr_oh, -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"-sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,15 DEL 1
! --- FOOT Connection ---
IF iFootConnType = FOOTCONNTYPE_FLOOR THEN !!! TO the FLOOR ADD -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2,0 ROTx 90 PRISM_ 6,sr_d, 0,h_w,15, 0,6",15, h_w,6",15, h_w,0,15, -4",0,15, -4",h_w,15 ADDx a-8" MULx -1 PRISM_ 6,sr_d, 0,h_w,15, 0,6",15, h_w,6",15, h_w,0,15, -4",0,15, -4",h_w,15 DEL 4 ENDIF
IF iFootConnType = FOOTCONNTYPE_WALL THEN !!! TO the WALL ADD -a/2+4",0,6" PRISM_ 6,sr_d, 0,0,15, 0,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-h_w,15, f_w,-h_w,15, f_w,0,15 ADDx a-8" MULx -1 PRISM_ 6,sr_d, 0,0,15, 0,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-h_w,15, f_w,-h_w,15, f_w,0,15 DEL 3 ENDIF
! --- STEPS ---
ADD -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/4,0 FOR s=1 to n_s ADDz s*dz-rw-0.001 BLOCK a-8",sr_d/2,rw DEL 1 next s DEL 1
if zzyzx>=saftyLimit then
! --- VERTICAL CAGEs ---
addz sr_bl prism_ 4,zzyzx-sr_bl+sr_oh, -a/2+h_w,-13",15, -a/2+h_w,-13"-vc_d,15, -a/2+h_w+vc_w,-13"-vc_d,15, -a/2+h_w+vc_w,-13",15
prism_ 4,zzyzx-sr_bl+sr_oh, a/2-h_w,-13",15, a/2-h_w,-13"-vc_d,15, a/2-h_w-vc_w,-13"-vc_d,15, a/2-h_w-vc_w,-13",15
prism_ 4,zzyzx-sr_bl+sr_oh, -a/2+h_w,-19",15, -a/2+h_w,-19"-vc_d,15, -a/2+h_w+vc_w,-19"-vc_d,15, -a/2+h_w+vc_w,-19",15
prism_ 4,zzyzx-sr_bl+sr_oh, a/2-h_w,-19",15, a/2-h_w,-19"-vc_d,15, a/2-h_w-vc_w,-19"-vc_d,15, a/2-h_w-vc_w,-19",15 del 1
addy -2'1/4"-a/2 tube 4,5,1+2+16+32, -vc_d/2,0,0, -vc_d/2,vc_w,0, vc_d/2,vc_w,0, vc_d/2,0,0,
0,0,0,0, 0,0,sr_bl,0, 0,5",z_temp,0, 0,5",zzyzx+sr_oh,0, 0,5",zzyzx+sr_oh+0.1,0 DEL 1
addy -2'1/2" rotz 55 addy -a/2+vc_w tube 4,5,1+2+16+32, -vc_d/2,0,0, -vc_d/2,vc_w,0, vc_d/2,vc_w,0, vc_d/2,0,0,
0,0,0,0, 0,0,sr_bl,0, 0,dL,z_temp,alfa, 0,dL,zzyzx+sr_oh,alfa, 0,dL,zzyzx+sr_oh+0.1,alfa del 3
addy -2' mulx -1 rotz 55 addy -a/2 tube 4,5,1+2+16+32, -vc_d/2,0,0, -vc_d/2,vc_w,0, vc_d/2,vc_w,0, vc_d/2,0,0,
0,0,0,0, 0,0,sr_bl,0, 0,dL,z_temp,alfa, 0,dL,zzyzx+sr_oh,alfa, 0,dL,zzyzx+sr_oh+0.1,alfa del 4
! --- HOOP ---
addz sr_bl prism_ 20,2", a/2-4"-f_w,0,15, a/2-4",0,15, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, a/2,-12",15, a/2,-3'2"+1'1/2",79, -a/2,-3'2"+1'1/2",1079, -a/2,-12",15, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4",0,79, -a/2+4"+f_w,0,15,
-a/2+4"+f_w,-h_w,15, -a/2+4"+h_w,-h_w,15, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-3'2"+1'1/2",79, a/2-h_w,-3'2"+1'1/2",1079, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-h_w,15, a/2-4"-f_w,-h_w,15
addz 4' for i=1 to n_hoop addz (i-1)*h_dis prism_ 20,2", a/2-4"-f_w,0,15, a/2-4",0,15, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, a/2,-12",15, a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",79, -a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1079, -a/2,-12",15, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4",0,79, -a/2+4"+f_w,0,15,
-a/2+4"+f_w,-h_w,15, -a/2+4"+h_w,-h_w,15, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",79, a/2-h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1079, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-h_w,15, a/2-4"-f_w,-h_w,15 del 1 next i del 2
addz zzyzx-2" prism_ 20,2", a/2-4"-f_w,0,15, a/2-4",0,15, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, a/2,-12",15, a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",79, -a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1079, -a/2,-12",15, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4",0,79, -a/2+4"+f_w,0,15,
-a/2+4"+f_w,-h_w,15, -a/2+4"+h_w,-h_w,15, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",79, a/2-h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1079, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-h_w,15, a/2-4"-f_w,-h_w,15
! --- RAIL on the TOP ---
addz sr_oh prism_ 16,2", a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2,15, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, a/2,-12",15, a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",79, -a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1079, -a/2,-12",15, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2,15,
-a/2+4"+h_w,-7"+sr_d/2,15, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, -a/2+h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",79, a/2-h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1079, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,15, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"+sr_d/2,15 del 2 else addz sr_bl
addx -a/2+4" prism_ 6, 2", 0,0,15, 0,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-h_w,15, f_w,-h_w,15, f_w,0,15 addx a-8" mulx -1 prism_ 6, 2", 0,0,15, 0,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-h_w,15, f_w,-h_w,15, f_w,0,15 del 3
addz 4' for i=1 to n_hoop addz (i-1)*4' addx -a/2+4" prism_ 6, 2", 0,0,15, 0,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-h_w,15, f_w,-h_w,15, f_w,0,15 addx a-8" mulx -1 prism_ 6, 2", 0,0,15, 0,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-h_w,15, f_w,-h_w,15, f_w,0,15 del 4 next i del 2
addz zzyzx-2" addx -a/2+4" prism_ 6, 2", 0,0,15, 0,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-h_w,15, f_w,-h_w,15, f_w,0,15 addx a-8" mulx -1 prism_ 6, 2", 0,0,15, 0,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,15, h_w,-h_w,15, f_w,-h_w,15, f_w,0,15 del 4 endif
IF top_rail THEN ADD a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2,zzyzx ROTx 90 ROTy 90 PRISM_ 8,sr_w, 0,0.3,15, tr_oh,0.3,15, tr_oh,sr_oh,15, 0,sr_oh,15, 0,sr_oh-sr_w,15, tr_oh-sr_w,sr_oh-sr_w,15, tr_oh-sr_w,0.3+sr_w,15, 0,0.3+sr_w,15
IF sr_oh-0.3>0.4 THEN ADDy 0.3+(sr_oh-0.4)/2 BLOCK tr_oh-sr_w,sr_w,sr_w DEL 1 ENDIF
ADDz -a+4"+sr_w PRISM_ 8,sr_w, 0,0.3,15, tr_oh,0.3,15, tr_oh,sr_oh,15, 0,sr_oh,15, 0,sr_oh-sr_w,15, tr_oh-sr_w,sr_oh-sr_w,15, tr_oh-sr_w,0.3+sr_w,15, 0,0.3+sr_w,15
IF sr_oh-0.3>0.3 THEN ADDy 0.3+(sr_oh-0.3)/2 BLOCK tr_oh-sr_w,sr_w,sr_w DEL 1 ENDIF DEL 4 ENDIF
! --- LANDING Platform ---
IF landing THEN ADDz zzyzx-0.05 PRISM_ 10,0.05, -a/2+4",0,15, a/2-4",0,15, a/2-4",lnd_w,15, -a/2+4",lnd_w,15, -a/2+4",0,-1,
-a/2+5",1",15, a/2-5",1",15, a/2-5",lnd_w-1",15, -a/2+5",lnd_w-1",15, -a/2+5",1",-1
ROTx -90 n_p = INT((lnd_w-2")/0.05) n_p2= INT((a-8"-2")/0.05)
FOR p=1 to n_p+1 ADDz p*0.05 POLY 4, -a/2+5",0, a/2-5",0, a/2-5",-0.05, -a/2+5",-0.05 DEL 1 NEXT p
ROTy -90 ADDz -a/2+4" FOR p2=1 to n_p2+1 ADDz p2*0.05 POLY 4, 1",0, lnd_w-1",0, lnd_w-1",-0.05, 1",-0.05 DEL 1 NEXT p2 DEL 2 DEL 2 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_2D:
PEN gs_cont_pen FILL gs_fill_type
cutplaneHeight = GLOB_CSTORY_ELEV - GLOB_HSTORY_ELEV + GLOB_CUTPLANES_INFO[1]
! --- CHECK for VISIBILITY --- bShowCage = ((ZZYZX+EPS) > saftyLimit) bCageTopView = (not(bStorySensitive) | (bStorySensitive & ((cutplaneHeight+EPS) > sr_bl)))
bShowPlatform = landing bShowRail = top_rail if bStorySensitive then if cutplaneHeight < ac_toplevel then bShowPlatform = 0 if cutplaneHeight < ac_toplevel then bShowRail = 0 endif
! --- HOTSPOTS --- unID=1
HOTSPOT2 0,0,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 a/2-4",0,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -a/2+4",0,unID :unID=unID+1 if bShowCage then HOTSPOT2 a/2,-1',unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -a/2,-1',unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 a/2,-1'8 1/2",unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,-a/2-0.515,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,-a/2-0.642,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -a/2,-1'8 1/2",unID :unID=unID+1 endif
! --- EDITABLE HOTSPOTS ---
if bShowPlatform then HOTSPOT2 0,0,unID,lnd_w,1+128 :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,-0.1,unID,lnd_w,3 :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0,lnd_w,unID,lnd_w,2 :unID=unID+1 endif
! --- EDITABLE HOTSPOTS ---
POLY2_B 5, 1+2+4+64,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2,-1
RECT2 -a/2+4"-h_w,-7"+sr_d/2-h_w,-a/2+4"-sr_w+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2+h_w
POLY2_B 5, 1+2+4+64,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2,1, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2,1, a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2,-1
RECT2 a/2-4"+h_w,-7"+sr_d/2-h_w,a/2-4"+sr_w-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2+h_w
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"+rw/2,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-rw/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-rw/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"+rw/2,1
! --- Safety Cage ---
if bShowCage then if bCageTopView then POLY2_B 20, 1+2+4+64,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4"-f_w,0,1, a/2-4",0,1, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2,-12",1, a/2,-3'2"+1'1/2",1, -a/2,-3'2"+1'1/2",1001, -a/2,-12",1, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4",0,1, -a/2+4"+f_w,0,1,
-a/2+4"+f_w,-h_w,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-h_w,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-3'2"+1'1/2",1, a/2-h_w,-3'2"+1'1/2",1001, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-h_w,1, a/2-4"-f_w,-h_w,1
POLY2_B 20, 1+2+4+64,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4"-f_w,0,1, a/2-4",0,1, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2,-12",1, a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1, -a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1001, -a/2,-12",1, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4",0,1, -a/2+4"+f_w,0,1,
-a/2+4"+f_w,-h_w,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-h_w,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1, a/2-h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1001, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-h_w,1, a/2-4"-f_w,-h_w,1 else POLY2_B 6, 1+2+4+64,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4",0,1, -a/2+4"+f_w,0,1,
-a/2+4"+f_w,-h_w,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-h_w,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1
POLY2_B 6, 1+2+4+64,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4"-f_w,0,1, a/2-4",0,1, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-h_w,1, a/2-4"-f_w,-h_w,1
line_type gs_LineTypeStUp
POLY2_B 14, 1+4+64,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2,-12",1, a/2,-3'2"+1'1/2",1, -a/2,-3'2"+1'1/2",1001, -a/2,-12",1, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,1,
-a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-3'2"+1'1/2",1, a/2-h_w,-3'2"+1'1/2",1001, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1
POLY2_B 14, 1+4+64,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4",-7"-sr_d/2,1, a/2,-12",1, a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1, -a/2,-2'9"+1'1/2",1001, -a/2,-12",1, -a/2+4",-7"-sr_d/2,1,
-a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4"+h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, -a/2+h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1, a/2-h_w,-2'9"+1'1/2",1001, a/2-h_w,-12"-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2-h_w/2,1, a/2-4"-h_w,-7"-sr_d/2,1
line_type 1 endif endif
! --- LANDING PLATFORM --- IF bShowPlatform THEN RECT2 -a/2+4",0,a/2-4",lnd_w
HOTSPOT2 a/2-4",lnd_w,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -a/2+4",lnd_w,unID :unID=unID+1 ENDIF
! --- RAIL on Top ---
unID = 50 IF bShowRail THEN POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2,1, -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,1, -a/2+4",-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,1
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64,gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2,1, a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2,1, a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,1, a/2-4",-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,1
HOTSPOT2 a/2-4"+sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,unID :unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -a/2+4"-sr_w,-7"+sr_d/2+tr_oh,unID :unID=unID+1 ENDIF
Symbol.Script_1D:
! const values for parameter: gs_detlevel_3D_m DLEV3D_OFF = 0 DLEV3D_SIMPLE = 1 DLEV3D_DETAILED = 2
! const values for parameter: iFootConnType FOOTCONNTYPE_FLOOR = 1 FOOTCONNTYPE_WALL = 2
!!! Caged_Ladder.GSM
EPS = 0.0001
!!!********************* STRING PARAMETERS
dim stFootConnDescr[2] stFootConnDescr[1]=`К Полу` stFootConnDescr[2]=`К Стене`
uiTopRail = `Ширина Поручней Вверху` uiLanding = `Ширина Площадки`
!!!********************* Basic Variables
f_w =3" !!! foot depth f_d =7" !!! side rail distance from the wall sr_w =2" !!! side rail width sr_d =3" !!! side rail depth
h_h =4" !!! hoops hight h_w =1/2" !!! hoops width
n_hoop=max(1,INT((zzyzx-sr_bl-4')/4'))
if zzyzx>15' then n_hoop=n_hoop+1
if zzyzx - sr_bl < 4' then n_hoop = 0
if n_hoop = 0 then h_dis = 0 else h_dis=(zzyzx-sr_bl-4')/n_hoop !!! distance between hoops endif
vc_w =1/2" !!! vertical cage width vc_d =2" !!! vertical cage depth
!!!********************* Calculated Variables
!!!********* Steps' number n_s_temp=INT((zzyzx+0.01)/RungDist) if ABS(INT((zzyzx+0.01)/RungDist)-(zzyzx+0.01)/RungDist)<0.1 then dz=zzyzx/(n_s_temp) else dz=zzyzx/(n_s_temp+1) endif
n_s=zzyzx/dz dL=3 1/2" alfa=15
if zzyzx - sr_bl < 4' then z_temp = zzyzx - 2" else z_temp = sr_bl+4' - 2" endif
Symbol.Script_UI:
TABID_ROOT = -1 TABID_GENERAL = 1
ui_current_page gs_ui_current_page
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! *** Page 1 *** !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ui_page TABID_GENERAL, TABID_ROOT, `Параметры Лестницы`, "uiTab_Dimension_flat(1)"
pageStartY = 5
pos_x=15 ! start Position X Coordinate pos_y= pageStartY ! start Position Y Coordinate OutfieldHgt=16 ! height of Outfield
!!! >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> !!! 1. Column >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
UI_SEPARATOR 0, pageStartY - 5, 444, pageStartY + 261
px = 60 py = pageStartY + 90 cx = px + 4 cy = py + 20
UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Крепеж Низа`, pos_x, pos_y, cx+30,OutfieldHgt UI_STYLE 0,0
ccx = 78
UI_INFIELD{3} "iFootConnType", pos_x, pos_y + 20, cx + 30, 235, 1, "LadderLegs(1)", 2, 1, ccx, cy, px, py, 1, stFootConnDescr[1], FOOTCONNTYPE_FLOOR, 2, stFootConnDescr[2], FOOTCONNTYPE_WALL
!!! >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
CellX1=cx+30 ! 1. Column Width DistCell=20 ! Dist. between Columns Pict1X=80 ! 1. Pict Width Pict1Y=70 ! 1. Pict Height
OutfieldWidth=140 ! general width of Outfield InfieldHgt=20 ! height of Infield InfieldWidth=60 ! general width of Infield Outfield2X=OutfieldWidth-InfieldWidth ! with2 of Outfield YY=20 ! distance between Outfiled
!!! >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> !!! 2. Column >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
StartCell2X=pos_x+CellX1+DistCell !! Start Position of 2. Column length1Text = 140
i=-1 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Высота Ограждения`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, OutfieldWidth,OutfieldHgt UI_STYLE 0,0 i=i+1 UI_PICT "CagedLadder_geom(1)", StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY,80,70,1 i=i+1 UI_INFIELD "sr_oh", StartCell2X+Outfield2X+1, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth,20 i=i+3 UI_OUTFIELD `Предел Высоты`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "saftyLimit", StartCell2X+Outfield2X+1, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth,20
i=i+1 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Параметры Ступеней`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, OutfieldWidth,OutfieldHgt UI_STYLE 0,0 i=i+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Толщина`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "rw", StartCell2X+Outfield2X+1, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth,20
i=i+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Шаг Ступеней`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "RungDist", StartCell2X+Outfield2X+1,pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth,20
i=i+1 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_INFIELD{3} "top_rail", StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, length1Text, 20, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, `Поручни Вверху`, 0, ! Top Rail 1, `Поручни Вверху`, 1 ! Top Rail
i=i+1 UI_STYLE 0,0 UI_OUTFIELD `Ширина`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "tr_oh", StartCell2X+Outfield2X+1, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth,20
i=i+1 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_INFIELD{3} "landing", StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, length1Text, 20, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, `Площадка`, 0, ! Landing Platform 1, `Площадка`, 1 ! Landing Platform
i=i+1 UI_STYLE 0,0 UI_OUTFIELD `Ширина`, StartCell2X, pos_y+(i+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "lnd_w", StartCell2X+Outfield2X+1, pos_y+(i+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth,20
!!! >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> !!! 3. Column >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>
StartCell3X=pos_x+CellX1+DistCell+OutfieldWidth+DistCell !! Start Position of 3. Column Outfield3X=OutfieldWidth-35 !!width3 of infield length2Text = 140
UI_SEPARATOR pos_x+CellX1+2*20+OutfieldWidth-10, pos_y, pos_x+CellX1+2*20+OutfieldWidth-10, 266-5
ii=-1 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `2D-отображение`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, OutfieldWidth,OutfieldHgt UI_STYLE 0,0
YY=22 ii=ii+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Перо Контура`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield3X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "gs_cont_pen", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-35+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, 35, 20
ii=ii+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Тип Штриховки`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield3X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_type", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-35+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, 35, 20
ii=ii+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Перо Штриховки`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield3X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_pen", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-35+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, 35, 20
ii=ii+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Перо Фона`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield3X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "gs_back_pen", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-35+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, 35, 20 YY=20
ii=ii+2 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `3D-отображение`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, OutfieldWidth,OutfieldHgt UI_STYLE 0,0
ii=ii+1 UI_OUTFIELD `3D`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD{3} "gs_detlevel_3D_m", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-InfieldWidth+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth, 20
ii=ii+1 UI_OUTFIELD `Аппроксимация`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield2X,OutfieldHgt UI_INFIELD "gs_resol", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-InfieldWidth+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, InfieldWidth, 20
ii=ii+1 UI_INFIELD{3} "gs_shadow", StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, length2Text, 20, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, `Отбрасывание Теней`, 0, ! Shadow 1, `Отбрасывание Теней`, 1 ! Shadow
ii=ii+2 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Покрытие`, StartCell3X, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY, Outfield3X-42,OutfieldHgt UI_STYLE 0,0 UI_INFIELD "mat_ladder", StartCell3X+OutfieldWidth-35-42+1, pos_y+(ii+1)*YY-2, 35+42, 23
Symbol.Script_VL:
call "FM_types" parameters all
values{2} "iFootConnType" FOOTCONNTYPE_FLOOR, stFootConnDescr[1], FOOTCONNTYPE_WALL, stFootConnDescr[2]
values "A" Range[0.4,) values "RungDist" RANGE [0.15,)
values "zzyzx" Range[7',) values "sr_oh" Range[0.5,] values "sr_bl" Range[0.1, zzyzx - 0.1] values "tr_oh" Range[5",] values "lnd_w" Range[5",] values "rw" Range(0,) values{2} "gs_detlevel_3D_m" DLEV3D_DETAILED, `Детальный`, DLEV3D_OFF, `Откл.` values "gs_resol" range [3,) values "saftyLimit" range [0,)
values "gs_ui_current_page" 1 if NOT(top_rail) THEN LOCK "tr_oh" if NOT(landing) THEN LOCK "lnd_w"
if gs_cont_pen=0 then parameters gs_cont_pen=4 if gs_fill_pen=0 then parameters gs_fill_pen=19
if not(bStorySensitive) then hideparameter "gs_LineTypeStUp" lock "gs_LineTypeStUp" endif
ac_bottomlevel = 0 ac_toplevel = ZZYZX + EPS
parameters ac_toplevel = ac_toplevel, ac_bottomlevel = ac_bottomlevel
Symbol.Comment: Лестница с ограждением и с зависимым от этажа 2D-символом.
Symbol.Keywords: Соединение внизу, платформа площадки, ограждение вверху
